Structure¶

class oct.Structure(mode='log')¶

Bases: object

Structure contrast OCT reconstruction

Methods

__init__([mode])

Initialize self.

formatOut(struct)

Format the output structure array to Uint8, according to contrast settings

initialize([data, settings, filterSize])

Initialize the structure reconstruction with desired setting :param data: Support and raw data holder :type data: object :param settings: Manual input settings holder :type settings: dict :param filterSize: filter X & Z sizes :type filterSize: tuple

intensity1Channel()

Compute Intensity / Structure frame from tomogram

intensity2Channel()

Compute Intensity / Structure frame from tomogram

manageChannels()

Handle case where only channel 2’s are passed

reconstruct([tomch1, tomch2, data, settings])

Reconstruct a structure contrast frame

requires()

Prints out the required/optional variables to perform reconstruction

setDefaultSettings()

Sets the default reconstruction settings for structural contrast

setSettings([data, settings])

Extract the required settings variables from the dataset metadata
